lenders.name: Claus Moeller
lenders.loan_because:
There are many good reasons for lending. We especially loan to buy water buffaloes. A water buffalo can lead a poor family out of poverty and give them a chance for a brighter future filled with hope and free from hunger. The animal provides draft power for planting rice and potatoes, milk for protein, and manure for fertilizer and fuel. 
A family can plant four times more rice with a water buffalo than by hand. 
The animal can haul heavy loads to market, where the sale of extra produce brings needed income for clothing, medicine, and school.

lenders.occupational_info: UNITED PHOTO PRESS is a photographic agency of great diversity and distinction owned by its photographer members, in Europe and Brasil. With powerful individual vision, United photographers chronicle the world and interpret its peoples, events, issues and personalities. The UPP library is a living archive updated daily with across the globe. You may search or browse our 10000,000+ images which are available online for licensing in a variety of formats. lenders.name: Alexandre
lenders.loan_because:
-- The Starfish Story --

A young man is walking along the ocean and sees a beach on which thousands and thousands of starfish have washed ashore. Further along he sees an old man, walking slowly and stopping often, picking up one starfish after another and tossing each one gently into the ocean. 

"Why are you throwing starfish into the ocean?," he asks.

"Because the sun is up and the tide is going out and if I don't throw them further in they will die."

"But, old man, don't you realize there are miles and miles of beach and starfish all along it! You can't possibly save them all, you can't even save one-tenth of them. In fact, even if you work all day, your efforts won't make any difference at all."

The old man listened calmly and then bent down to pick up another starfish and gently tossed it into the sea. "It made a difference to that one."

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I believe that micro finance is one of the best ways to mitigate poverty.  There are too many talented, motivated people out there being held back by lack of access to capital, and I am glad to play a tiny role is alleviating that issue.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to grow businesses through marketing and business development.

lenders.name: Alyssa
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to reach out a helping hand and touch people thousands of miles away. I always support people trying to accomplish their dreams and goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children who have been hospitalized with infections, injuries, or for surgeries. I love taking care of the children and their families by answering questions, providing treatments and medications, and being there to provide comfort. I love being a nurse!

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I feel that every person has the right to do better for themselves, but sometimes to do better one needs a hand up.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I believe that a little help makes a big difference.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I feel bad because these people don't have a lot of money to do stuff.

lenders.name: Mohsin H.
lenders.loan_because: i can help someone now!
lenders.occupational_info: Don't wait. Do what I can today! Do more someday.

lenders.name: Raheem
lenders.occupation: President of Los Angeles Microfinance Network
lenders.loan_because: I believe access to credit is a fundamental human right, and poverty eradication begins from the bottom up. We all have the capacity to make real change in the world, and it's important to remember that a little money goes a long way around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am trying to increase awareness of Microfinance around Los Angeles through networking events and speaking events. We want to connect likeminded Microfinanciers to others in their own communities, ultimately spreading the good word.

lenders.name: Jasmin
lenders.loan_because: As I started my own business I had to go through some tough times where I often didn't know if my money would be enough to pay my rent. But the difference is that I live in a rich country which gives some payments to people who suffer from poor and try to build theit own business. Many countries can't afford this sort of payments, that's why I decides to pay something back - now as my business runs!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a business coach and management trainer where I teach business skills to people who have to or want to fit better in their business role. Work-Life-Balance and stress-counseling are some of my favorite methods.

lenders.name: Rondy
lenders.loan_because: we have so much and I believe we are called to share what we have with others.  I believe in justice.
lenders.occupational_info: I care for my children, and take care of our home.
